BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE EST_QTR_PRV_RECOVERY_DUES_DTL SET DT_ALLOTMENT_DATE=?,DT_VACATION_DTL=?,NUM_LICENSE_FEES_AMT_DUES=?,STR_LICENSE_FEES_AMT_DUES_DTL=?,NUM_ELEC_FEES_AMT_DUES=?,STR_ELEC_FEES_AMT_DUES_DTL=?,NUM_CIVIL_FEES_AMT_DUES=?,STR_CIVIL_FEES_DUES_DTL=?,STR_LICENSE_FEES_DUES_PAID=?,DT_LICENSE_FEES_DUES_PAID_DATE=?,STR_ELEC_FEES_DUES_PAID=?,DT_ELEC_FEES_DUES_PAID_DATE=?,STR_CIVIL_FEES_DUES_PAID=?,DT_CIVIL_FEES_DUES_PAID_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE NUM_PREV_REC_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?
UPDATE EST_QTR_PRV_RECOVERY_DUES_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_PREV_REC_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?
UPDATE EST_QTR_PRV_RECOVERY_DUES_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_PREV_REC_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?
DELETE FROM EST_QTR_PRV_RECOVERY_DUES_MAP WHERE NUM_PREV_REC_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?

INSERT INTO EST_QTR_PRV_RECOVERY_DUES_MAP (NUM_HOSPITAL_ID, NUM_PREV_REC_ID, STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE, NUM_LIC_FEES_AMT_DUES_PAY, NUM_ELEC_FEES_AMT_DUES_PAY, NUM_CIVIL_FEES_AMT_DUES_PAY, STR_FEES_DUES_DTL, DT_FEES_DUES_PAID_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_QTR_PRV_RECOVERY_DUES_DTL SET STR_EMP_REMARKS=? ,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_PREV_REC_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?
